docket_entries.description: Chapter 13 Voluntary Petition Individual Debtor Credit Counseling Certificate due by 7/14/2009, Schedules/Statements due by 7/14/2009, Debtor Statement of Current Monthly Income and Disposable Income due by 7/14/2009, Payment Advices Declaration Required by 11 USC Section 521(a)(1)(B)(iv) due by 7/14/2009, Chapter 13 Plan due 7/14/2009, filed by ALFONSO PALAFOX (Medina, Diane) Additional attachment(s) added on 7/1/2009 (McElroy, Cynthia). Trustee Certificate of Service Final Report And Account filed by EDWARD 10 MANEY on behalf of EDWARD J. MANEY (related document(s) 18 Trustee Chapter 13 Final Report - Dismissed Case (batch)).(MANEY, EDWARD 10) (Entered: 10/01/2009)

The estate having been fully administered, further administration of the reopened case having been completed, or the case reopened for the filing of further proceedings which either have been filed and no further court action is required or were not filed within 90 days of the reopening; IT IS ORDERED that the case is closed and if a trustee has been appointed, the trustee is discharged from and relieved of his trust. Jurisdiction is retained over any pending adversary(s). Bankruptcy Judge George B. Nielsen Jr. (Hall, Pat) (Entered: 10/02/2009)
